html:
Verb[edit]

aguntur

  1. third-person plural present passive indicative of agō
    1. "they are done, they are made"
    2. "they are accomplished, they are managed, they are achieved"
    3. "they are performed, they are transacted"
    4. "they are driven, they are conducted"
    5. "they are pushed, they are moved, they are impelled"
    6. "they are guided, they are governed, they are administered"
    7. "they are discussed, they are pleaded, they are deliberated"
    8. "they are thought upon"
    9. "they are stirred up, they are excited, they are caused, they are induced"
    10. "they are chased, they are pursued"
    11. (of some courses of action) "they are driven, they are pursued"
    12. "they are robbed, they are stolen, they are plundered, they are carried off"
    13. (of time) "they are passed, they are spent"
    14. (of offerings) "they are slain, they are killed (as a sacrifice)"
    15. (of plants) "they are put forth, they are sprouted, they are extended"
